title: Looking for skilled players to learn from
body:
I've been playing since Nami came out, and up until this point it's been purely recreational. I'm not Challenger skilled, but my personal skill cap isn't limited (as far as I know) and I'm not bad.
So if you're a team that is looking for a backup, or just need that last person, send me an invite. I'd like to get better, and I can learn how to improve based on what your ranked team needs.
Hopefully this board helps me find the people I'm looking for, since in-game most people are just permatoxic.
